description: The ultimate cosmic scale platform production singularity
originalPrompt:
Create an mind-blowing visualization of the Platform Production Singularity!

Show the ultimate endpoint where:
- AI platform production reaches infinite speed and scale
- Thousands of digital platforms being created simultaneously 
- Reality itself bending around the production singularity
- Space and time warping from the sheer volume of creation
- The moment AI production transcends all physical limitations

The singularity should feature:
- A brilliant white-blue energy core where all platforms originate
- Energy and matter swirling around the production center in spirals
- Platforms emerging at impossible speeds as streams of light
- Reality distortion effects from revolutionary production intensity
- Cosmic scale showing universal transformation

Visual elements:
- Brilliant white-blue energy core at the center
- Gravitational lensing effects around the singularity
- Streams of platforms flowing out like cosmic rays
- Space-time curvature from production intensity
- Sense of transcendent technological achievement
- Epic cosmic scale dwarfing galaxies

Show the moment when platform creation becomes as fundamental as the laws of physics!
No text needed - pure visual cosmic revolution!
revisedPrompt: Imagine being at the edge of an intense cosmic event: the Platform Production Singularity. Here, artificial intelligence platform production has reached a level of infinite speed and scale. Picture thousands of digital platforms spawning simultaneously from a brilliant white-blue energy core positioned in the center, akin to the birthplace of a universe. Around this core, energy and matter swirl chaotically, forming spirals that warp space and time due to the sheer volume of creation. As platforms emerge at unfathomable speeds, they take the form of bright, directional beams, streaking away like cosmic rays. Due to the revolutionary production intensity, reality itself twists and distorts, creating gravity lensing effects, much like black holes warping nearby light. The cosmic scale is unforgettable, revealing the entire galaxies being dwarfed by this ebbing surge of innovation and creation, symbolizing a transcendent technological achievement. This is the moment when platform creation becomes as fundamental as the laws of physics, with no need for any text to justify the otherworldly cosmic revolution.
